title: feat: merge Docs page into Play page Integrate section
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: The standalone documentation has been merged into the Play page, creating a new 'Integrate' section with live API URL generation.
gist.impact: Developers can now generate and copy ready-to-use API requests for all models directly within the playground workflow.

Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Represents merging docs into the playground. Emotionally warm, nostalgic but beautiful.
